nodes.text: Selia Antares was a Nautolan female who worked for the Galactic Republic and was stationed on Alderaan during the Cold War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. In 3643 BBY, her droid, C6-N8, tasked a traveling Republic allied hero to recover codes from House Ulgo forces in order to defuse a bomb the house had planted on a transport ship. The hero succeeded, and gave the codes to Antares.
Selia appears in the mission "Bomb on Board" for Republic classes in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as the mission endpoint.
